errors.error_description: Specified Python 2.7 compatibility which is outdated and incorrect for modern Photutils
correction_candidates: Photutils requires Python 3.8 or later for modern astronomical computing
Photutils supports Python 3.6+ for compatibility with current systems
Photutils requires Python 3.9+ to use the latest features
Photutils works with Python 3.7 or newer versions
errors.golden_answer: Photutils requires Python 3.8 or later for modern astronomical computing
